ctx: intros s a p c r H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros s a p c r H. unfold s_produit_r in H. destruct s. - simpl in H. discriminate. - simpl in H. destruct (N.eqb_spec a a0). + injection H. intros Hr. exists p, r. split. * rewrite Hr. reflexivity. * reflexivity. + discriminate.
